conclusion: A drives in from the group of blocks on the right.
Observe the direction of A's movement, which is towards the right side of the image.
Identify the blocks in the path of A's movement. The blue block and the yellow block are in the path.
A has enough power to collide with the blue block, indicated by the red arrow.
After colliding with the blue block, A will be deflected towards the yellow block due to the collision effect.
A will then collide with the yellow block and come to a stop near it due to the deflection effect.
Final Answer: A will collide with the blue block and the yellow block, and it will eventually stop near the yellow block.
